law.text: When signs are erected giving notice thereof, no person shall stop, stand or park any vehicle except officially licensed taxis in taxi zones described in official Traffic Schedule No. 22. Taxi operators may park in such zones while waiting for riders provided that they remain within five feet of their cab at all times unless expeditiously assisting a passenger. (Ord.
